nodes.text: The Bylluran system was a star system that was located in the Grumani sector, in the Outer Rim Territories. The planet Byllura was located in the system, and during the Republic Dark Age, it served as the capital world of the Dyarchy, a Sith state that was led by the child Sith Lords Dromika and Sith. In c. 1032 BBY, forces of the Arkadianate Sith state clashed with the Dyarchy Fleet over Byllura, and control of the planet fell to the Arkadianites.
